name: Village (Danda)
description:
A city builder, in which you get scored for the placement of your buildings.
How, you ask? That's out of your control! Make it beautiful, and maybe you'll find out along the way.

Inspired by David King's Tiny Islands 

A game by: Daniel Dalebjörk

Audio from freesounds: Meisben, Stijn, Breviceps, JavierZumer

Icons from icons8
